promoBadgeMessages.badgeText: Save $300 on us with select trade. New line req.
promoBadgeMessages.badgeToolTip: Up to $1149.99 device payment purchase required. Less $300 trade-in/promo credit applied to account over 24 mos w/in 1-2 billing cycles; promo credit ends when balance paid or line terminated/transferred; 0% APR. Trade-in must be in good working and cosmetic condition. New line required.

promoBadgeMessages.badgeText: Free Memory Card + Save $300 w/ select trade. New line required.
promoBadgeMessages.badgeToolTip: $929.99 device payment purchase required. Less $300 trade-in/promo credit applied to account over 24 mos w/in 1-2 billing cycles; promo credit ends when balance paid or line terminated/transferred; 0% APR. Trade-in must be in good working and cosmetic condition. New line required. Memory Card Redemption: Must be 18+ & 50 US/DC/PR/USVI res. From 7/1/18 – 7/31/18 ("Purchase Period"), purchase a Samsung Galaxy S9, S9+, or Note8 phone on a device installment plan, 2-year contract plan, or outright purchase at full retail price ("Qualifying Purchase"). By 8/7/18 at 11:59:59 PM ET, using your Qualifying Purchase device, follow instructions on the Shop Samsung app ("App") to submit required info and receive a memory card ("Gift") (either a 64GB (est. value $60), a 128GB (est. value $99), or a 256GB (est. value $199.99) memory card; memory card size will be the same size as the Qualifying Purchase's internal memory). Gifts only available while supplies last. After verification of Qualifying Purchase, Gifts will be mailed in apprx 6-8 weeks. No more than 205,000 64GB memory cards will be available, no more than 1,000 128GB memory cards will be available, and no more than 1,000 256GB memory cards will be available. In the event that Gifts are unavailable for any reason, Samsung, in its sole discretion, may choose to issue a Reward eCertificate in the apprx value of the Gift as a substitute. Reward eCertificates are valid only at www.Samsung.com or in the App for use towards an eligible purchase, and are valid through 10/15/18. Gifts subject to availability and are non-transferrable. Limit 1 Gift per Qualifying Purchase. Void where prohibited or restricted by law. Additional restrictions apply. Offer subject to additional Standard Offer Terms and Conditions available at http://promos.samsung.com/terms. Samsung reserves the right to modify or discontinue offer at any time by posting notice on the app or website.
